mapper.insert: insert into system_base_const (cid, logic_code, module, key, value, desc, is_delete, create_time, modify_time, create_user_code, modify_user_code) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select cid, logic_code, module, key, value, desc, is_delete, create_time, modify_time, create_user_code, modify_user_code from system_base_const where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
